titles.title: Retirees Sustainable Investment Policies Act of 2020
Retirees Sustainable Investment Policies Act of 2020
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to require retirement plans to establish Sustainable Investment Policies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Retirees Sustainable Investment Policies Act of 2020
This bill requires retirement and employee benefit plans to establish and follow a sustainable investment policy, including policies relating to the corporate governance practices, labor and human rights practices, and the environmental risks of the entities receiving investments.
